channel.title: InYourBones — Bay Area Radar (far_out)
channel.description: Curated upcoming Bay Area shows from InYourBones.

item.title: Ariana Grande @ Oakland Arena
item.description: 2026-06-07 03:00 → 2026-06-11 03:00 — Ariana Grande at Oakland Arena. Ariana Grande's tour promises a high-energy performance from a pop superstar with a massive following.

item.title: RUSH @ SAP Center at San Jose
item.description: 2026-10-16 02:30 → 2026-10-18 02:30 — RUSH at SAP Center at San Jose. RUSH's legacy and the excitement surrounding their Fifty Something tour make this a must-see for rock fans.

item.title: Rainbow Kitten Surprise @ Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley
item.description: 2026-07-19 03:00 — Rainbow Kitten Surprise at Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley. Rainbow Kitten Surprise is gaining buzz for their unique sound and engaging live performances.

item.title: Tedeschi Trucks Band @ Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley
item.description: 2026-08-13 01:00 — Tedeschi Trucks Band at Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley. Tedeschi Trucks Band is renowned for their powerful live shows and musicianship.

item.title: Jack Johnson @ Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley
item.description: 2026-10-01 01:30 → 2026-10-02 01:30 — Jack Johnson at Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley. Jack Johnson's laid-back vibe and strong fanbase make his shows a consistent draw.

item.title: Screeching Weasel @ August Hall
item.description: 2026-09-02 03:00 — Screeching Weasel at August Hall. Kid Cudi's tour is highly anticipated, promising a blend of hip-hop and engaging stage presence.

item.title: Three Days Grace @ SAP Center at San Jose
item.description: 2026-11-19 03:00 — Three Days Grace at SAP Center at San Jose. Three Days Grace's Alienation Tour is set to deliver a powerful rock experience.

item.title: Train @ Shoreline Amphitheatre
item.description: 2026-08-27 01:45 — Train at Shoreline Amphitheatre. TRAIN's anniversary tour celebrates their classic hits, appealing to nostalgia-driven fans.

item.title: Bob Moses @ Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley
item.description: 2026-07-18 02:30 — Bob Moses at Greek Theatre-U.C. Berkeley. Evanescence's tour with Spiritbox and Nova Twins is set to deliver an electrifying rock experience.

item.title: O.A.R. @ The Masonic
item.description: 2026-08-13 01:30 — O.A.R. at The Masonic. O.A.R. has a loyal following and their Three Decades Tour promises a mix of fan favorites.

item.title: Doja Cat @ Chase Center
item.description: 2026-10-20 02:30 — Doja Cat at Chase Center. Doja Cat's world tour is generating significant buzz, promising a dynamic performance.

item.title: Lionel Richie @ Chase Center
item.description: 2026-08-07 02:30 — Lionel Richie at Chase Center. Lionel Richie and Earth, Wind & Fire's collaboration is a nostalgic powerhouse for fans of classic hits.
